name: passport-verify
description: A passport.js plugin for authenticating with Verify and Verify Service Provider

scripts.preinstall: node -e 'if(!/yarn\.js$/.test(process.env.npm_execpath))throw "NPM not supported, please use Yarn to install dependencies ($ yarn install).\n"'
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha ./build/test/*

author: Verify
